editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It's hard to understate Clash of Clansâ€™ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile. Over time the build, train, and attack gameplay has been honed to perfection through fantastic updates. We still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught, and to experience the rush of victory after our carefully assembled attack force yet again smashed through enemy defenses.
Clobber pesky rebels while rallying villagers and recruiting heroes in this idle strategic defense game.

Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercellâ€™s awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package thatâ€™s easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, thereâ€™s no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

editorialNotes.standard: Jellyfish-like spacecraft! Gigantic mechs! Forge the right equipment and thereâ€™s nothing your scrappy battleship canâ€™t handle.

editorialNotes.standard: A phenomenon from the start, PokÃ©mon GO hasnâ€™t stopped evolving. Since launch, the best-in-class location-based AR game has expanded with countless improvements. Hatch eggs while the game runs in the background. Battle other trainers with your favorite creatures. Join memorable community day events. With a steady stream of awesome updates and hundreds of iconic creatures to catch, Nianticâ€™s groundbreaking hit just keeps getting better.

ios.subtitle: Customize A City of Your Own

editorialNotes.tagline: Build a thriving base on Mars

editorialNotes.standard: Years ago, Plants vs. Zombies defined a genre with its fresh concept, undeniable charm, and innovative, balanced gameplay. Now the undead have risen again, bringing with them new time-traveling tales and a massive slew of new zombies and plants. Whether you stomp enemies without paying a dime or buy new experimental plants and power-ups with In-App Purchases, the result is the same: an incredible sequel that's fresh and fun throughout, reminding us why we fell in love with this world in the first place.

editorialNotes.standard: Build the metropolis of your dreams in this free-to-play city builder from EA. Stunning graphics, intuitive controls, and addictive mechanics make the experience truly extraordinary. Behind its polished gleam, SimCity BuildIt retains the same high-quality gameplay fans have come to expect from this enduring franchise.

editorialNotes.standard: Fast-paced, accessible, and utterly brilliant, Marvel Snapâ€™s quick, competitive matches are packed with seemingly infinite possibilities. Do you annoy opponents by dominating the first roundâ€™s playing field with Squirrel Girlâ€™s rodent hordes? Or do you build your 12-card deck around the complementary card effects of the Guardians of the Galaxy? Thereâ€™s no wrong answer. Fantastic animations, abilities, and art that perfectly channel the personality of the comics help make this one of the best card games on the App Store.

editorialNotes.standard: Reworked and retrofitted for gaming on the go, League of Legends: Wild Rift brings the franchiseâ€™s twitchy thrills, unmatched depth, and nail-biting tactics to iPhone and iPad. Each match is a fast-paced 5v5 tug-of-war. Pick from dozens of champions and head onto the battlefield, charging down one of three lanes as you help your team destroy the enemyâ€™s Nexus. Combining slick, accessible touchscreen controls with the tactical brilliance that turned League of Legends into a worldwide sensation, Wild Rift is a must-play MOBA for newcomers and vets alike.
The cheerful humor of the Bikini Bottom crew keeps us smiling as we juggle orders in chaotic cooking challenges.
